upcomingEvents.name: Annual Car Show
upcomingEvents.description: Our biggest event of the year! Join us for a full day of vintage cars, food, and fun. Open to the public.

upcomingEvents.name: Monthly Club Meeting
upcomingEvents.description: A virtual meeting for all VCCA Queens members to discuss upcoming events and club news. Members only.

upcomingEvents.name: Fall Cruise to the North Fork
upcomingEvents.description: Enjoy the scenic autumn views on a drive to the beautiful North Fork of Long Island. All vintage cars welcome.
